days.text: Temperature falling significantly. Mainly cloudy. A few light rain patches. Force 4 to 6 northerly winds with gusts.
Dry. Mainly cloudy. Force 4 to 6 northerly winds with gusts.
Dry. Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 4 northerly winds, occasionally force 5 with gusts.
Very dry. Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 3 to 4 northerly winds.
Very dry. Fine. Force 2 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
